level.text: This chapter shall apply to applicants for and holders of a license to practice as a polysomnographic technologist and application for and holders of a registration to practice as a polysomnographic technician or polysomnographic trainee.
Effective immediately, no person shall practice polysomnography in the District of Columbia unless he or she is licensed or registered under this chapter.
An applicant to practice as a polysomnographic technologist shall be licensed in accordance with ยง 8102.
An applicant to practice as a polysomnographic technician shall be registered in accordance with ยง 8103.
An applicant to practice as a polysomnographic trainee shall be registered in accordance with ยง 8104.
Occupations: Administrative Procedures), and 46 (Medicine) of this title shall supplement this chapter.
Source: Notice of Final Rulemaking published at 58 DCR 3758 (April 29, 2011).
